title: Pretty Pretty Pegasus
description: There’s nothing friendship can’t fix. Solve problems without violence with Butterbean, Sparkleface, Princess Puffballs, Princess Silkiesoft, Gumdrop Goblin, Jelly Roll, Buttermilk Biscuit, and High Step.
quote: You’re the most amazing cotton candy ever!
altHero: Butterbean and Sparkleface, two colorful pegasus ponies, stand in a cotton candy field
alt2: a sparkling blue pony butt with purple tail
alt3: Butterbean and Sparkleface in a candy dungeon next to some floating candy keys
alt4: Sparkleface looking confused as cotton candy wilts under the rain
